Original:
第一次來踩點的酒吧，真的是非常非常的驚艷耶！

本來去年看到的時候，就想來試試看了，因為工作的關係，一直拖到現在才能來一訪，先不說酒好不好喝（是真的超好喝！）

假日（五六日）一千元（平日888）+一成服務費可以從開店喝到打烊這一點我就覺得超級划算了！

酒的濃度可以隨著顧客喜好在點單的時候可以另外備註，超符合個人的飲酒習慣的❤️

而喝到飽的品項有光長島冰茶跟環遊世界都再喝到飽的品項我就覺得物超所值了啊啊啊啊！
EN:
The first time to step on the point is really very, very stunning!

When I saw it last year, I wanted to try it. Because of the work, I could only visit it until now.

Holiday (56th) 1,000 yuan (888 on weekdays)+10 % service fee can be super cost -effective!

The concentration of wine can be remained separately as the customer likes to order, which is super in line with personal drinking habits ❤️

And the full items that have been full are the items that have been full of light island ice tea and the world, and I think it is worth it!

Original:

調酒師很細心的詢問新郎、新娘各自喜歡的食物，去調出專屬的味道，到店面試喝的時候真的非常驚艷！很好喝，完全不需調整！
宴客當天親友們也很開心有調酒可以喝，非常推薦新人可以參考一下喔！
另外也推薦平常可以去店裡小酌一下，超放鬆😎 …

When I saw the stalls on the stool bar at the wedding exhibition, I felt very good after asking for the initiative. I thought to give guests a small surprise on the wedding day.
The bartender asked carefully about the food that the groom and the bride liked, and went out of the exclusive taste. When I was interviewed by the store, it was really amazing!It's delicious, no need to adjust at all!
On the day of the banquet, relatives and friends are also very happy to drink alcohol. I recommend newcomers to refer to it!
It is also recommended to go to the store for a drink, super relaxed ...

Original:
很有特色，價格合理，東西又好吃的酒吧🍸🍹會想要再來的一家店👍
到酒吧除了可以喝到價格合理的酒品之外，小菜也是非常重要，這裡的小菜很推薦大家來吃，今天點了好些，照喜愛及好吃度寫順序；1.黃金熔岩蝦球，金黃的酥皮外觀跟擺排，馬上心動😋熱乎乎的蝦球，內起司流出，真好吃👍2.喜慶紅鴨賞，原本並不看好這小菜，所以，這是再最後覺得意猶未盡加點的，意外的好吃，鴨賞味道剛好，不過鹹，佐蒜頭及辣椒，很提味😋鴨賞是有厚度的，這完全改變以前吃過的口感和經驗.3.醬香雞肉串，選了孜然粉調味，這烤的好juicy,肉和醬完全融合，擠點金桔,美味啊！4.醬烤深海霸王魷魚翅，這擺盤跟配料先給個95分🤭辣椒細絲（不辣，感覺純搭色），青蔥苗，鹹菜圃（這真是一絕👍）單吃或搭魷魚各有特色5.剝皮辣椒豬肉卷，這排最後不是不好吃，是因為吃起來肥感大，我吃一卷就吃不下了；完全覺得老板可以開燒烤店，生意應該是會很好，廚藝真的很不錯，喜歡酒吧小菜的朋友，千萬要來踩凳子🙂
酒的部份，有啤酒（買3送1顯或平日888喝到開心），各種調酒，呵！今天點了一杯無酒精特調，根據喜好，有五種選項可自行勾選（花香，果味，氣泡，偏甜，偏酸），或更多要求可考考老板👍，花香+果味+氣泡綜合上了粉紅飲，有草苺及玫瑰味，好喝啊！可樂娜加檸檬角，爽快好喝！
酒吧有兩層樓，樓上有沙發座椅，還有浪漫的佈置，也有飛鏢和彈珠台，整個店走浪漫風，不管是閨蜜聚會，男女朋友約會，或獨處時光，或想喝一點吃點小菜，這裡是不錯的選擇，大家來吃吃玩玩👍
EN:
Very distinctive, reasonable price, and delicious bars.
In addition to drinking a reasonable price of wine, small dishes are also very important. The side dishes here recommend everyone to eat. Today I ordered the order of love and deliciousness. The appearance of the meringue, the shrimp balls that are hot immediately, the cheese flows out, it ’s so delicious. 2. It ’s delicious, duck rewarding is just right, but salty, garlic and pepper, which is very thick. This completely changes the taste and experience that I have eaten before .3. Season with cumin powder, this baked is good, meat and sauce are completely fused, squeeze some kumquats, delicious!4. Sakura grilled deep sea bully squid wings. There are distinctive features 5. Peeling pepper pork rolls. This row is not not delicious in the end, because it tastes fat, I can’t eat a roll; I completely feel that the boss can open a barbecue restaurant, and the business should be very good. The cooking skills are really good. Friends who like bars and small dishes, come to step on stools 🙂
The part of the wine is beer (buy 3 get 1 show or drink 888 on weekdays), all kinds of bartending, huh!今天点了一杯无酒精特调，根据喜好，有五种选项可自行勾选（花香，果味，气泡，偏甜，偏酸），或更多要求可考考老板👍，花香+果味+ The bubbles are integrated with pink drink, with strawberries and roses, which are delicious!Cola Najia lemon horns, refreshing and delicious!
There are two floors of bar, there are sofa seats upstairs, and romantic layouts. There are also darts and marbles. The whole shop takes a romantic style. Eat some small dishes, here is a good choice, everyone come to eat and play 👍

Original: 初次造訪「踩凳子．吧」時，醉了。握著一杯杯五彩繽紛、絢爛夢幻、煙雲裊裊的彩色酒，恍如置身於年少時，最愛去的那家舊金山街角小酒吧，在微醺氛圍中呼朋喚友，醉它鄉….。 這間由年輕調酒師Yao開的創意雞尾酒吧，有個非常在地的名字「踩凳子」，店長Yao 說，在台灣訂婚儀式中戴戒指時，新娘雙腳要踩在小圓凳上，象徵未來進入婆家後會富貴好命; 婚禮調酒是他們店的特色服務之一，取「踩凳子」意喻預祝每位被他們服務過的新婚夫婦，富貴有餘，店裡客源也源源不絕。 在店裡的小樓上，有酒吧間少見的長沙發，可以極度放鬆，躺在那，看著虛擬的滿天星空，真是下班後喝一杯，消磨時光的好地方。
EN: When I first visited "Step Stool."Holding a cup of colorful, gorgeous dreamy, smoke and clouds, it is like being in the old Francisco street corner bar that he loves to go to the most of his favorite when he was young.This creative cocktail bar opened by young bartender Yao has a very local name "Step on the Stool". The manager Yao said that when wearing a ring in Taiwan's engagement ceremony, the bride should step on the small round stool on the small round stool. , Symbolize the wealthy and good life after entering the in -laws; wedding bartending is one of the special services of their store. Take the "stepping on a stool" to prefers every newly -married couple who have been served by them. Endless.On the small building in the store, there are rare long sofas in the bar, which can be relaxed extremely, lying there, watching the virtual starry sky, it is really a good place to drink a drink after get off work.
